name: Keep cats alive!
description:
Continuation of the epic story of the flood. Having built the raft, you have not forgotten about the rest of the inhabitants of the land - cats!

Control: mouse
Collect as many cats as possible in 5 minutes! But be careful: the more cats on board, the more food they require!

Over time, the islands go under water, so by the end of the game it will be difficult to find anything
